code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a m aged 75 ys presents with 13 months history of Kidney. he smokes 1 pack/day for 2 years he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 69 in, Weight 136 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel.

s:patient presents with Kidney. patient is a 76 YO white male retired. he smokes one pack/day for 2 years he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 134 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered US Kidney.
